About the Company: GSL Securities Limited is a Non Banking Financial Services Company. The company provides various financial services in India. It primarily focuses on short term financing and making investments. The Company was incorporated with the main objective of pursuing the business of Financial Services like Leasing, Hire Purchase, Financial Consultancy, Bill Discounting, Stock Broking, Investments, etc.
